name: GUNSTABLE MAYHEM
description:
MACHINE. WAKE UP. ### NEW TARGET. PROCEED ###

In GUNSTABLE MAYHEM, the robot world of 2089 has been retaken by the human rebellion. You are *Machine*, the last in a long line of mechanical robots fuelled on blood. After 16 years, you are awake in a fragile, UNSTABLE body. You must prevent your core from overheating it by ejecting it into the air. Get to work Machine, there are humans to eliminate.

## CONTROLS ##

- *WASD/Space* MOVEMENT

- *Left Click* SHOOT

- *LShift* EJECT CORE

// POWERUPS //

- *Right Click* AKIMBO & TIMEWARP

#### Special Thanks

- *LGBlaze* Speech Bubble sprites
